sentences.en: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
sentences.cn: 一鸟在手,胜于二鸟在林.

sentences.en: Bush has racked up victories in another five states.
sentences.cn: 布什在另外五个州又获得了胜利.

sentences.en: Don't beat about the bush when you have anything to say.
Don't beat about the bush. Please come to the point.
sentences.cn: 说话不要绕圈子,请直说吧.

sentences.en: Don't beat around the bush, come straight to the point!
sentences.cn: 别拐弯抹角, 直截了当地说吧!

sentences.en: George W. Bush carried the state with 56 percent of the vote.
sentences.cn: 乔治·W.布什在该州以56%的得票率获胜。

sentences.en: He beat about the bush without coming to the point.
He raced ahead up into the bush, barking and snarling.
sentences.cn: 它嗥叫着冲向前，一头钻进了灌木丛。

sentences.en: Mr. Bush has entered and hosted the White House.
Please get to the point. Don't beat about the bush.
sentences.cn: 请直说吧,不必拐弯抹角!

sentences.en: Stop beating about the bush. What's he done?
sentences.cn: 别再拐弯抹角了，他到底干了什么？

sentences.en: The Bush Foundation has funded a variety of faculty development programs.
sentences.cn: 布什基金会已经资助了许多教员发展项目。

sentences.en: The child was hiding in the bushes.
The jeep was found lying in thick bush.
sentences.cn: 人们发现吉普车翻倒在一处茂密的丛林里。

sentences.en: They walked through the dense Mozambican bush for thirty six hours.
sentences.cn: 他们花了36个小时穿过茂密的莫桑比克丛林。

sentences.en: This bush has grown up a lot in the last few months.
sentences.cn: 这矮树丛几个月来已向上长高了很多.

words.tran_cn: 疲倦的；被草丛笼罩的；不知所措的
浓密的；灌木茂密的；多毛的
丛生；以灌木装饰（bush的过去分词）
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的
以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭

trans.tran_cn: 如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的
灌木，灌木状的东西（尤指毛发），荒野地带
trans.tran_en: a plant with many thin branches growing up from the ground

trans.tran_cn: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
